author: @infobae
title: Cómo preparar un licuado de avena con proteína, nuez y plátano para aumentar la masa muscular y volverse más fuerte - Infobae
text:
Este poderoso licuado te va a ayudar a llegar a tus ganancias necesarias de proteína - (Imagen Ilustrativa Infobae) La proteína es un componente esencial en la dieta de quienes asisten al gimnasio y buscan desarrollar masa muscular. Favorece la reparación y el crecimiento de los tejidos musculares después del ejercicio, optimizando el proceso de recuperación.
Existen diversas fuentes de proteína que pueden ser incorporadas en la dieta diaria. Las proteínas animales , como el pollo, el pescado, los huevos y la carne magra, se consideran completas porque contienen todos los aminoácidos esenciales. Por otro lado, las proteínas vegetales provienen de alimentos como las legumbres, los frutos secos y los granos enteros. Aunque a veces son incompletas, combinarlas adecuadamente puede suplir las necesidades del organismo.
Los batidos de proteína en polvo son una opción popular entre los deportistas. Estos suplementos, a menudo hechos de suero de leche, caseína o proteína vegetal, ofrecen una manera práctica de incrementar la ingesta proteica. Es crucial consumirlos en el contexto de una dieta equilibrada y no como sustitutos de las comidas.
Una forma de consumir proteínas en grandes cantidades es a través de un licuado , una bebida fácil de preparar, con un sabor muy delicioso y con beneficios de sus ingredientes. Aquí te contamos cómo hacer un licuado de proteína con avena, nuez y plátano para mejorar tus ganancias en el gimnasio.
Licuado de proteína con avena, nuez y plátano: receta y los beneficios de cada uno de sus ingredientes
Delicioso licuado de proteína hecho con plátano y nuez - (Imagen Ilustrativa Infobae). Un licuado de proteína con avena, nuez y plátano es una opción nutritiva y deliciosa para quienes buscan recuperar energía después del ejercicio o complementar su dieta diaria. A continuación, la receta y los beneficios de sus ingredientes.
Receta:
1 taza de leche (puede ser de origen animal o vegetal) 1 plátano maduro 1/2 taza de avena 1/4 taza de nueces 1 scoop de proteína en polvo (sabor natural o vainilla) Hielo al gusto Instrucciones:
Coloca todos los ingredientes en una licuadora. Mezcla hasta obtener una consistencia suave y homogénea. Sirve de inmediato y disfruta. Beneficios de los ingredientes:
bowl de avena, ingrediente clave para este licuado - (Imagen Ilustrativa Infobae) Avena: Rica en fibra soluble, la avena ayuda a mantener estables los niveles de azúcar en sangre y proporciona energía sostenida. Su contenido de carbohidratos complejos es ideal para reponer las reservas de glucógeno tras el ejercicio. Nuez: Las nueces son una excelente fuente de grasas saludables, especialmente ácidos grasos omega-3. También ofrecen proteínas vegetales, antioxidantes y vitaminas como la vitamina E, que ayudan en la recuperación muscular y protegen contra el estrés oxidativo. Plátano: Este fruto es una fuente rápida de energía gracias a su contenido de carbohidratos simples. Además, es rico en potasio, un mineral esencial para prevenir calambres musculares y mantener el equilibrio electrolítico en el cuerpo. Proteína en polvo: Facilita el aporte de aminoácidos esenciales necesarios para la reparación y el crecimiento muscular. El tipo de proteína elegido puede variar según preferencias personales o restricciones dietéticas. Leche: Aporta proteínas de alta calidad y calcio, fundamental para la salud ósea. Aquellos que opten por leche vegetal pueden elegir alternativas enriquecidas en calcio para obtener beneficios similares. Este licuado combina ingredientes que, además de nutrir, favorecen la recuperación y el rendimiento físico.

author: VNExplorer
title: Even SP has wilted under the Hindutva wave, says party leader
text:
Former SP leader Saleem Sherwani and party president Akhilesh Yadav.
Samajwadi Party member, five-time former Badaun MP and ex-Union minister, Saleem Sherwani, says things have reached such a pass that even a staunch secularist party like his, has wilted under the Hindutva onslaught.
“Times have really changed. Even if a Muslim raises a legitimate issue today, he is branded an anti-national,’’ Sherwani told this reporter.
Last week, he quit the post of Samajwadi Party (SP) national general secretary over the party’s “inappropriate” selection of Rajya Sabha candidates and neglect of the Muslim community and their issues.
Sherwani has denied that he had left the party post because he was denied a Rajya Sabha berth from UP this time. “I have repeatedly requested a Rajya Sabha seat for the Muslim community, according to the party’s tradition. Although my name was not considered, there was not a single Muslim candidate among the nominees announced by the party. The way tickets have been distributed for the Rajya Sabha shows that the SP does not give importance to the PDA or the pichada, Dalit, alpsankhyak (backward, Dalit, and minorities) sections anymore,’’ he said.
The SP has fielded veteran Dalit leader Ramji Lal Suman, actor Jaya Bachchan, whose term as RS member of SP comes to an end on April 2, and a former UP chief secretary Alok Ranjan, for the current Rajya Sabha election.
The veteran former MP said: “I have been consistently discussing the situation of Muslims with party chief Akhilesh Yadav, conveying to him that the community is feeling neglected and losing faith in the SP. There is a growing distance between the two, and the party should not underestimate their support. The sentiment among Muslims is increasing that no one in the secular platform is willing to address their legitimate issues.”
Taking his logic to another level, Sherwani queried: “This raises the question of how different the SP from the BJP is?”
According to him, when the political discourse centres only around the BJP’s ability to ‘show Muslims their place’, the country has taken a dangerous turn. “Unemployment, poverty, joblessness, you name it, impact the majority 80% population of the country, who are Hindus. Where is the question of putting Muslims their place? The worst affected are the Hindus.’’
Saleem Sherwani won his first Lok Sabha election as a Congress candidate from Badaun in 1984. After that, he won four elections from the constituency as the SP candidate. When the party denied him a ticket to the seat in 2009 and fielded Mulayam’s nephew Dharmendra Yadav instead, Sherwani moved back to the Congress and re-contested the seat. But Dharmendra won. In 2020, Sherwani came back to the SP.
Asked how Mulayam Singh Yadav would have stood up to this new alignment of forces and this new atmosphere, Sherwani said it is difficult to say, but “maybe, he would have been more independent and taken a stand.”
Sherwani did not place too much trust in the INDIA alliance. “The attempt to form a strong opposition alliance is proving to be futile. No one seems to be taking it seriously. It appears that the Opposition is more interested in fighting each other rather than combating the BJP,’’ he said, but added that “the only silver lining is the new SP-Congress seat sharing in UP.’’
As per the terms of this agreement announced this week, Congress will contest 17 seats while the remaining 63 will go to Samajwadi Party and other allies as part of the INDIA bloc.
Read more news like this on HindustanTimes.com

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Qatari court’s commutation of death sentence of 8 Indians a major diplomatic victory
text:
Summary by Ground News The commutation of death sentences awarded to eight former Indian Navy personnel to various sentences ranging from three to 25 years by the Qatari Court of Appeal is seen as a diplomatic victory by the Indian establishment. The death sentence was pronounced in October after the Navy personnel were detained in August 2022. The charges against them are not known, but reports hinted they have been held for espionage. author: Emma Camp
title: Will Zohran Mamdani kill the best thing about New York City public schools?
text:
With Zohran Mamdani projected to win the New York City Democratic mayoral primary, his slate of socialist-influenced policies , from city-owned grocery stores to a rent freeze, are one step closer to reality. Mamdani's socialist agenda won't stop with housing policy or the minimum wage. It will also hit America's largest public school system and aim to kill the best thing about it.
While New York City schools are routinely criticized for overspending, underaccountable teachers' unions, and general dysfunction, the city's group of selective high schools is a consistent bright spot. Eight schools, including Mamdani's alma mater, Bronx High School of Science, admit students through an exam. The schools give talented students from all over the city the ability to escape chaotic local schools and receive an education at some of the top public high schools in the country.
However, the Specialized High School Admissions Test (SHSAT), which is the test used to admit students, has long come under fire for what critics say is a racial bias. That's because Asian students overwhelmingly perform best on these tests. In 2023, for example, over two-thirds of the students at Stuyvesant High School (widely regarded as the best of the eight high schools) were Asian. However, this framing is reductive. It's worth noting that Asians have the lowest median income of any racial group in New York City. And, contrary to the popular vision of magnet schools being comprised of upper-middle-class white and Asian students, New York's selective high schools are economically diverse; 50 percent of Stuyvesant students are economically disadvantaged. At Bronx Science, it's 52 percent .
But that hasn't kept politicians from attacking the schools as segregated, and the SHSAT as racist. In 2018, then-Mayor Bill de Blasio (D) called the high schools a "monumental injustice." He attempted to survert a state law protecting the SHSAT, but the admissions change has so far been tied up in a legal battle.
Over the years, Mamdani has stated that he would also attempt to ditch the admissions test. "As a graduate of Bronx Science, I have personally witnessed just how segregated New York City public schools are, especially our specialized high schools," he said in a 2022 interview . "I support measures to integrate our public schools and fully fund our education system, including the abolition of the SHSAT."
Last month he made a similar statement , saying that "My administration will focus on addressing the root educational causes of this segregation by implementing recommendations from the 2019 School Diversity Advisory Group's at elementary and middle schools across our city and support an independent analysis of the Specialized HS exam for gender and racial bias." The recommendations he mentions argue in favor of eliminating elementary school-level gifted and talented programs, and placing a moratorium on new test-in high schools.
While it's reasonable to be troubled by the disproportionate lack of black and Hispanic students at specialized high schools, it's important to remember that ditching a test that reveals entrenched inequalities does nothing to ameliorate them. Further, the city already has a program to allow low-income students who barely missed out on admissions to still attend specialized schools with extra study during the summer, which seems like a fair way to balance merit with concerns that students with fewer resources may miss out on admissions.
Getting rid of a merit-based opportunities metric can't close persistent achievement gaps between ethnic groups. Instead, it will deprive talented students—low-income students whose parents can't afford private school in particular—of the ability to attend a school with similarly talented peers, while making it harder to identify how and why other students are struggling.

author: L_105015
title: 湖南麻阳富硒米亮相第七届粮交会
text:
2025年07月15日14:40 | 来源： 人民网－湖南频道 小字号
通过陈列展览、线上直播带货及“云逛展”，多途径推介麻阳富硒米。单位供图 7月12日至14日，第七届中国粮食交易大会、第五届全国脱贫地区优质特色粮油产品展销会在沈阳同步举办。湖南麻阳苗族自治县组织多家粮油企业组团参展，推介“麻阳富硒米”这一地域特色品牌，充分展现该县在“优质粮油工程升级版”建设及乡村振兴中的丰硕成果。
活动现场，来自湖南麻阳苗族自治县“麻阳富硒米”因其独特的地理位置和产地优势备受关注。该县不仅通过线下展位进行产品陈列与展示推广，还在专业主播带领下，邀请线上网友“云逛展”了解麻阳粮油产品工艺，直播间同步开展带货，实现线上线下联动推广。
近年来，麻阳在富硒米产业发展上成绩斐然，在政府引导、种植大户带头、群众参与的治理模式下，全县水稻种植面积稳定在21.8万亩左右，其中富硒水稻种植规模不断扩大。
此次参展是麻阳县落实消费帮扶政策的重要举措，通过全国性平台展示脱贫地区产业发展成果。目前，麻阳正以粮交会、展销会为纽带，持续推动本地粮油产品与经销商、商超等建立长期合作，进一步拓宽销售渠道，带动农户增收，为巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果与乡村振兴有效衔接注入动力。（潘芳）
展会现场。单位供图 (责编：黄卓、罗帅) 分享让更多人看到

author: Joseph Loftus
title: 2024’s first meteor shower set to light up the sky tonight
text:
2024’s first meteor shower set to light up the sky tonight
Keep your eyes peeled.
While we’re only three days into 2024, one of the strongest meteor
showers of the year is set to be visible in Ireland and the UK tonight.
The first one of the year is set to peak this evening (Wednesday, 3 January) and you certainly won’t want to miss it.
The meteor shower up above us this evening is the Quadrantid Meteor Shower which runs from 28 December until 12 January, however, it’ll reach its peak tonight.
The incredibly strong celestial phenomenon can produce around 110 shooting stars every single hour.
The peak of the Quadrantids will last for around six hours between late tonight and dawn tomorrow morning.
2024’s first meteor shower set to light up the sky tonight
Royal Museums Greenwich have said that to stand a good chance of watching the spectacle this evening you should head to a wide open space with little light pollution at around midnight.
It said:
“Hunting for meteors, like the rest of astronomy, is a waiting game, so it’s best to bring a comfy chair to sit on and to wrap up warm as you could be outside for a while.
“They can be seen with the naked eye so there’s no need for binoculars or a telescope, though you will need to allow your eyes to adjust to the dark for at least 15 minutes beforehand.”
And now for the bad news.
Unfortunately, the peak will coincide with the Moon’s Last Quarter phase which means moonlight will likely cause some interference in viewing the shooting stars.
Also, Met Éireann has forecasted that tonight will be "cold with an added wind chill factor", with lowest temperatures of zero to 5 degrees.
As such, you’ll want to be wrapping up warm if you’re heading out to see the meteors.

author: VNExplorer
title: Tigres: Nicolás Ibáñez cuestiona las condiciones del clima en su partido vs Puebla FC
text: MONTERREY, MEXICO - ABRIL 27: Nicolas Ibanez del Tigres en festejo despues de anotar el cuarto gol de su equipo durante el juego de la jornada 27 del Torneo Clausura 2024 de la Liga BBVA MX en el Estadio Universitario el 27 de Abril del 2024 en Monterrey, Mexico. (Foto: Alfredo Lopez/JAM MEDIA) El futbolista argentino Nicolás Ibáñez del conjunto de los Tigres de la UANL dentro de la Liga MX, confesó que tuvieron un partido muy complicado frente al Club Puebla y señaló a las condiciones del clima, tras el encuentro de la jornada 2 de la Leagues Cup 2024. El delantero del equipo de los Universitarios comandado por el director técnico serbio Veljko Paunovic, habló frente a los medios de comunicación al finalizar el encuentro en el estadio de Texas, siendo cuestionado sobre lo apretado de su triunfo frente a la Franja. Lee: Cruz Azul: Revelan posible ubicación para la construcción del nuevo estadio de la Máquina Sabíamos que iba a ser un partido duro y así fue, el clima estaba muy pesado para jugar, pero gracias a Dios lo sacamos adelante", señaló el delantero Felino. Nicolás Ibáñez señaló que el clima estuvo muy pesado durante el partido frente al Club Puebla de José Manuel de la Torre, pero ya conocían que se iban a enfrentar a un duro rival y además tuvieron un clima muy pesado el cual pudieron superar, para sacar la victoria a favor de Tigres UANL. "Estoy contento por el grupo, veníamos a ganar y lo conseguimos pese a que sabíamos que iba a ser un partido duro frente al Club Puebla", puntualizó Nicolás Ibáñez y de cara al siguiente partido de Tigres UANL frente al Inter de Miami CF por la cima de su grupo.

author: Fabien Le Floch
title: Colombie: 25’000 personnes confinées sous la menace de groupes armés - 20 minutes
text: Environ 25’000 personnes sont confinées depuis dix jours et risquent de manquer de nourriture dans des villages indigènes de l’Amazonie colombienne (sud), en raison des menaces de dissidents des FARC, a déclaré jeudi le gouverneur local. Dans les municipalités de Solano et Milan (sud), «une confrontation est imminente» entre l’État-major central (EMC) et la «Segunda Marquetalia», a indiqué sur une radio nationale le gouverneur du Département Caqueta, Luis Francisco Ruiz. Ces deux groupes armés rivaux sont tous deux des dissidents des FARC (Forces armées révolutionnaires de Colombie), guérilla marxiste démantelée depuis la signature d’un accord de paix historique signé en 2016 avec cette guérilla marxiste. «Très dangereux» Avec des tracts, ainsi que des audios et des vidéos diffusés sur les réseaux sociaux, les rebelles interdisent aux habitants de se déplacer. «Nous ressentons de la peur, de l’angoisse, de l’anxiété (...) Nous ne pouvons pas dormir», a déclaré par téléphone à l’AFP un dirigeant communautaire local qui a préféré garder l’anonymat. «Il est très dangereux de sortir». Un audio attribué à un chef présumé de la guérilla circule depuis la semaine dernière. «Personne n’est autorisé à marcher le long de la rivière (...) De peur que des innocents n’y tombent (...) Tout le monde reste tranquille», prévient cet enregistrement, dont l’AFP n’a pas pu vérifier l’authenticité. «Il y a une restriction de la mobilité sur les rivières Orteguaza et Caqueta qui nuit principalement» à deux communautés indigènes situées près de la triple frontière entre la Colombie, l’Équateur et le Pérou, a expliqué le gouverneur Ruiz. «Aucun contrôle» «Cela concerne environ 25’000 personnes, isolées par les restrictions imposées sur les rivières dans une zone où le seul accès se fait actuellement par voies d’eau». Au cours des dix derniers jours, seules «deux barges (...) avec des denrées non périssables» ont pu entrer dans cette zone. Pour le reste, il n’y a «aucune mobilité de transport commercial», a-t-il déploré. Le gouverneur s’est joint à l’appel lancé lundi par les organisations indigènes, qui ont demandé au président Gustavo Petro «des solutions immédiates face à l’encerclement permanent, aux menaces et aux atteintes à la libre circulation des communautés» dans la région. «Ce qui est démontré ici, c’est que nous n’avons aucun contrôle sur le fleuve Caquetá», a constaté de son côté le président Petro, en demandant aux forces de sécurité d’intervenir. Cessez-le-feu Premier président de gauche de l’histoire du pays, Gustavo Petro a entamé des discussions avec les principaux groupes armés opérant dans le pays, dont les dissidents des FARC, avec l’ELN guévariste, des groupes paramilitaires et des narcotrafiquants. Cette politique de «paix totale» se heurte à de nombreux obstacles et est sévèrement critiquée par l’opposition, alors que certains de ces groupes armés ont multiplié leurs actions pour accroître leur influence territoriale. L’EMC est le plus grand groupe dissident des anciennes FARC, avec quelque 3500 combattants. Il discute avec les délégués de Gustavo Petro depuis octobre dans le cadre d’un cessez-le-feu convenu jusqu’à juillet. La «Segunda Marquetalia» compte environ 1600 hommes sous le commandement de l’ancien numéro deux des FARC, Ivan Marquez, qui avait participé à l’accord de paix de 2016. En 2019, le chef de la guérilla a renié le pacte, repris les armes et s’est réfugié à la frontière colombo-vénézuélienne où il a été un moment donné comme mort, selon les renseignements militaires.

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: Arkpax Set to Illuminate Boot Düsseldorf 2024 with Groundbreaking Innovations in Renewable Portable Power Solutions | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: Arkpax , the global leader in solar generators and clean portable power solutions, is excited to announce its participation as an exhibitor at the highly anticipated Boot Düsseldorf 2024, held at Messe Düsseldorf. Renowned for its innovative approach, Arkpax is committed to pushing the boundaries of portable power technology. With a focus on ruggedness, convenience, and style, Arkpax is set to make a splash at Boot Düsseldorf 2024 with its groundbreaking IP67 waterproof portable power solutions. Arkpax's Boot Düsseldorf 2024 Highlights: Unleashing the Power of Water Resistance: Prepare to be amazed as Arkpax showcases its cutting-edge lineup of IP67 waterproof portable power solutions at Boot Düsseldorf 2024. Among the highly-anticipated products are the Arkpax Solar Generator Pro, Evo, and Nano, all boasting the remarkable IP67 rating. Designed to withstand even the harshest environments, these robust models offer unbeatable protection against water, ensuring reliable performance during the most challenging outdoor adventures. Experience the freedom of portable power without limits with Arkpax's waterproof innovations. " Arkpax has always been a pioneer in delivering sustainable and innovative power solutions, and we are thrilled to unveil our latest advancements at Boot Düsseldorf 2024," said Anthony Chan, Head of Product Marketing at Arkpax. "Our products have received immense acclaim among outdoor enthusiasts, boaters, and adventurers, and we eagerly look forward to engaging with the maritime community to showcase how Arkpax can redefine their power requirements." In addition to captivating product displays and engaging live demonstrations, attendees are invited to connect with the Arkpax team for personalized discussions, comprehensive product showcases, and immersive experiences, where they can explore the diverse applications and transformative potential of Arkpax's unparalleled waterproof portable power solutions. Don't miss the opportunity to experience Arkpax's game-changing IP67 waterproof portable power solutions at Boot Düsseldorf 2024. Visit Hall 10/10A03 at the Messe Düsseldorf (Hall 10) from January 20 to 28. To learn more about Arkpax's products and partnerships, please visit Arkpax.com. Media Contact Company Name: TWS Technology LLC Contact Person: Olivia Stone Email: Send Email Country: United States Website: www.arkpax.com
